text: (b) Consider the computation of the same function as in (a), namely f(z) = V&? +0.01 — v/ — 0.01, for the following three numbers on the same IEEE 754 double precision system: o 21 = —10°; that is, we are computing f(—10%) o 2, = 10'%; that is, we are computing f(10'°) o x5 = 10%°; that is, we are computing f(10%) For the following questions, there is no need to justify your answer. i. Write down the number or numbers ; (if there are any) for which overflow will occur. [1 mark] ii. Write down the number(s) z; (if there are any) for which no overflow will occur but a cancellation error will occur which causes the resulting computation to be zero. [1 mark] ili. Rewrite the formula for f(z) in a way that makes it more suit- able for numerical computations and avoids some situations of overflow and cancellation errors. [2 marks]
